<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Necrotic Bomb](/Equipment.aspx?ID=938)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Bomb" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=21" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Negative" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=118" />
<trait label="Splash" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=150" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #165: Eyes of Empty Death](/Sources.aspx?ID=81) pg. 74</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 1

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Strike</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Necrotic bombs combine reagents most people consider disgusting at best and unholy at worst, creating a life-sucking miasma upon contact with air. A necrotic bomb deals the listed negative damage and splash damage, and it sickens the primary target on a critical hit. This damage harms only living creatures. Many types grant an item bonus to attack rolls.

</column>

<traits>

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bomb deals 1d6 negative damage and 1 negative splash damage. On a critical hit, the target is [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34).
